description: This file defines a Button component using the LightningJS framework. It specifies the visual template, internal state, and input handling logic for the button, including toggling favorite status upon user interaction.

classes.name: Button
classes.description: A LightningJS component representing an interactive button with toggle functionality.

methods.name: state
methods.description: Initializes and returns the component state, including 'isFavorited', 'favoriteText', and 'unfavoriteText'.

methods.name: input.enter
methods.description: Handles the 'enter' input event by toggling the 'isFavorited' state.
